translation:
Citizen

Being presented to this Government a copy of the official letter, which on the 11th of the past month you addressed to the citizen Dr. Judge of Law of that District, whom you refused to obey as Chief of Police of the same; and having the same Government acquiesced to the measure taken by the General-in-chief of the army, ordering that the said Dr. Judge of Law reassume the functions of General Chief of District Police, since this provision is in harmony with the laws of the Empire of Brazil, which we provisionally follow; we order you to be considered dismissed from the aforementioned position of General Chief of Police of this department, which you have performed with such honor: what I communicate to you for your understanding and proper execution.

God keep you. Secretariat of Justice at Alegrete, September 27, 1842. To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. José Pedroso de Albuquerque.

Secretariat of the Republic Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães — Boqueirão. From the Minister of Justice. Official letter from the Minister of Justice granting me my dismissal.
